bio.experienceSummary:
Hi, I'm Jessica! I have experience working in a daycare as a toddler teacher and floater, which allowed me to work with various age groups. I've also babysat and nannied for children from newborns to 12 years old.

While I haven't had the chance to do night nannying yet, I'm familiar with it and open to the opportunity. I hold a certification in medical billing and coding, but I'm planning to return to school for my degree in early childhood education.

In my previous roles, I've provided lighthouse cleaning, meals, naptime, walks, playtime, and educational activities like reading, science experiments, and art. I've also handled school pick-ups and drop-offs. For infants, I focus on music, books, tummy time, feedings, diaper changes, and sleep training to help them meet developmental milestones.

I am a non-smoker, fully vaccinated (with boosters), and pet-friendly! I'd love to meet your family and help care for your little ones. Thank you!

description.originalText: Jessica was such a patient and loving caregiver for my 4 month old daughter!  She provided consistent attention and interaction, worked on her developmental milestones, and was great soothing her as well.  Sheâ€™s also very responsive and responsible- I highly recommend her!

bio.experienceSummary:
I'd describe my personality as kind, optimistic and caring! I love art, and travel!

I have 4 years of experience working with children from premature infants to 15-year-olds.

In my spare time, I do photography! One thing you should know about me is I'm very understanding and patient! I'm cooperative and can always lend a hand!

I am allergic to cats !

description.originalText: Natalee was a great help to me. She was an amazing person who took the time to understand and develop a long lasting bond with my son.  Whenever I needed her she was always available. Natalee showed my son lots of love, and she really cared for him.

bio.experienceSummary:
I have 6+ years of childcare experience, and I am currently a lead fitness instructor at My Gym. I believe that my extensive experience working with diverse age groups has equipped me with the unique ability to connect with children of all backgrounds. I am comfortable caring for all ages and can help with pets if necessary. Also, I can manage school drop-offs and pickups, and I love crafting engaging and fun activities for kids to enjoy both inside and outside of the home. 

I'd describe my personality as charismatic, funny, and energetic 

I like working with kids because it is so fun to see them develop and grow, and I am determined to make the future generation the best it can be.
Hi! My name is Ayah. I am from the west village and currently attend Baruch College. I have 3 siblings and over 5 years of babysitting experience!

Hi, I'm Kait! I have 12 years of child care experience (8 yrs babysitting, 4 yrs full-time nanny). I can help with light housekeeping and carpooling. I am comfortable running errands around NYC and taking children to/from school, activities and playdates. I can help with children's meals and meal prep. I do not smoke or drink alcohol. I am currently a student at FIT and looking to work for a family on my days I do not have school. I am punctual, reliable and responsible!
I am hoping to find a family I work with on Wednesdays, Fridays, and weekends.
I am happy to provide multiple recommendations upon request.

description.originalText: Kait is wonderful. Prompt, patient, and caring. My small toddler is usually sad to separate and takes time to warm up to new people. She loved Kait, feeling quickly comfortable. Kait clean up the toys they played with before leaving. Really great!

bio.experienceSummary:
Hello! My name is Jadyn!! I love working with kids! I am a dancer, part time nanny, and babysitter here in New York. 
Last year, I graduated from Southern Methodist University with a Bachelor of Fine Arts in Dance Performance. I have extensive experience working with children of various ages. I have been a dance teacher for about 7 years, working with kids from age 3 all the way to age 12. I also have helped to run activity camps in the summer where I would have the kids from 9am-2 p.m.  I have been babysitting 8 years for infants all the way to teenagers. I often care for my nephew who is now 4 years old, and have been since he was an infant. 

I currently am a part time nanny for two families here with children who are 1, 4, and 7. I also babysit often for different families around New York. 

I am First Aid and CPR certified!

I have 6 years of experience working as a nanny and personal chef. My professional background is mostly in culinary arts and education, doing work with local farms, getting kids and families excited about local, seasonal foods. If your kiddos are interested in cooking, baking, sewing/design, botany/foraging, woodworking, or anything outside then I'd be a great fit! I bring a play based learning mindset, my goal is to have fun and be a supportive friend to the kiddos I work with. I've worked with newborns-teens, twins, groups of 5. I love working with kiddos who have ASD, and have some ABA therapy experience. 
I'm happy to help with cooking/meal prep, laundry, housekeeping, errands, grocery shopping, and carpool. Don't hesitate to reach out with further questions,

Warmly,

description.displayText: We used Alexis for a few weekdays when my almost-2-year-old daughter couldn't go to daycare. She was great at communicating about logistics leading up to arriving, and after arrival, she immediately understood the situation and adapted very well to our needs and specifics. She was thoughtful about sending updates and letting us know where she was and what they were doing. We were very comfortable with her, and my daughter warmed to her quickly. When I came home from work, her and my daughter were calmly reading books together on the couch. What a dream. We will definitely hire her again.
description.originalText: We used Alexis for a few weekdays when my almost-2-year-old daughter couldn't go to daycare. She was great at communicating about logistics leading up to arriving, and after arrival, she immediately understood the situation and adapted very well to our needs and specifics. She was thoughtful about sending updates and letting us know where she was and what they were doing. We were very comfortable with her, and my daughter warmed to her quickly. When I came home from work, her and my daughter were calmly reading books together on the couch. What a dream. We will definitely hire her again.

bio.experienceSummary: My name is Michaela. I'm currently obtaining my doctorate degree. I've spent 14 years as a childcare provider because I have a passion for fostering children's growth and development. I'm patient, calm, creative, and friendly, and I enjoy playing games that promote learning and physical activity. I believe in open communication with parents and will provide regular updates on your child's day and any issues that arise. I'm comfortable caring for children of all ages, and I can help with light housekeeping. I've received CPR training and completed coursework in early child development. I'm committed to providing a safe, nurturing, and stimulating environment for your child. I hope we're a good fit for each other!

description.originalText: Michaela is such a person. She has helped raise all my kids and I trust her with their lives.

bio.experienceSummary: I am a full time Registered Nurse at Mount Sinai looking to pick up occasional day time and date night sitting! I have 10+ years of babysitting experience, CPR certification, and all background checks! I am a non-smoker!

Midwife | Babysitter | 10 years of experience

I have been a dedicated babysitter for the past 10 years, driven by my passion for caring for children and infants. This passion led me to pursue a career as a midwife, and I have successfully earned my degree. Additionally, I hold certifications in First Aid and CPR, ensuring the safety and well-being of the children I care for. My experience has equipped me with strong communication skills, a nurturing attitude, and the ability to manage both routine and emergency situations with confidence.
